Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.clouds

Class Cloud

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.clouds.Cloud
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Cloud extends Object implements Serializable
The Cloud class models the clouds of the game, with the attributes and the methods needed for their management

      public Map<Clan,Integer> pick()
      The method pick returns the students contained in the Cloud, sets picked to true and empties the students array
      Returns:
      the students contained in the Cloud

    • fill

      public void fill(Map<Clan,Integer> stud)
      The method fill sets picked to false and puts the students given by parameter in the Cloud
      Parameters:
      stud - the students with which the Cloud is filled
